name: LIPSTICK / AUTE CUTURE STARRING ROSALÍA
description: A collection of red and neutral Lipstick shades in Matte and Amplified finishes co-created by Rosalía.

name: POWDER KISS LIQUID LIPCOLOUR / RUBY'S CREW
description: Our iconic, vivid blue-red hue – now in a whipped, mousse-like texture that moisturizes lips for ten hours, too!

name: LUSTREGLASS SHEER-SHINE LIPSTICK
description: A lightweight, raspberry seed- and organic extra-virgin olive oil-infused lipstick that delivers sheer and shiny colour with a long-wearing, lustrous finish.

name: COLOR MASTER LIPSTICK
description: Color Master Lipstick is formulated with Vitamin E and Shea Butter to moisturize and soften the lips, as well as for a smooth appearance.

name: PRIME'N LIPS
description: A lightweight, raspberry seed- and organic extra-virgin olive oil-infused lipstick that delivers sheer and shiny colour with a long-wearing, lustrous finish.

name: Creamy and Glossy Lipstick
description: A lipstick with special texture enriched with oils to smooth your lips and offer a glossy, colorful finish.

name: LOVE ME LIPSTICK
description: A weightless argan oil-infused lipstick that delivers an instant hit of powerful colour and all-day moisture in a luxurious satin-soft finish.

name: LIPSTICK / TEMPTING FATE
description: A limited-edition collection of berry and neutral Lipstick shades in Matte and Amplified finishes.

name: LIPGLASS
description: A gloss in a wide colour range that can create a glass-like finish or a subtle sheen.

name: LIPSTICK / BOTANIC PANIC
description: The iconic product that made M·A·C famous – now in a maze of seasonal shades for on-trend looks.

name: LIPSTICK / THE DISNEY CRUELLA COLLECTION BY M·A·C
description: A rich matte Lipstick formula with high-colour payoff and a creamy matte finish in three Cruella-inspired shades.

name: JOY LIPSTICK CASE BY BOB JORDAN
description: A limited-edition, online-only, star-printed Joy Lipstick case to customize two best-selling shades.

name: JOY LIPSTICK CASE BY BOB JORDAN
description: An innovative non-sticky, weightless liquid lip colour that combines the highly saturated, vibrant colour of a lipstick with the powerful 3D shine of a lip gloss.

name: AMPLIFIED LIPSTICK
description: An ultra-creamy Lipstick formula with a smooth glide, bold colour payoff, full coverage and a semi-lustrous finish.

name: LIPSTICK / TEMPTING FATE
description: A limited-edition collection of berry and neutral Lipstick shades in Matte and Amplified finishes.
